name: ASSIGNMENT_DATA
description: This table holds the patients and roster identifiers for whom specific roster assignment data was loaded.

columns.name: ASGN_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the assignment data record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_2_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...)

columns.name: ROSTER_IDENTIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description: The roster population that this record contains tracking data for.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient for whom this record contains roster tracking data.

columns.name: ASSIGNMENT_EFF_DATE
columns.description: The start date of the roster assignment period.

columns.name: ASSIGNMENT_TERM_DATE
columns.description: The end date of the roster assignment period.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTED_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider attributed to the patient for the assignment period.

columns.name: LAST_MODIFIED_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that this roster assignment period was last loaded or backed out.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_DEMOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the External Demographic Set that this assignment is loaded to.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_IDENT_BUNDLE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the External System Identifier Bundle that this assignment is loaded to.
